about_the_game:
Eat the cake before your friends without getting spotted !

Premier Servi (First Arrived, First Served) is a colorful Party Game featuring delicious French Pastry.

Everyone starts on the left, but only the First person Arrived will be served ! Hide among friends and game controller character to arrive first, and select carefully who you want to eliminate

Features :
A main party game mode to play with your friends, featuring Ais and a laser to eliminate your friends
2 main sub-modes to vary gameplay, as well as many other small tweaks improving replayability
A cake collection view to see and collect all the cakes you encounter during your games
A "cake" point system to select the winner after each set of rounds
Up to 4 players locally or online with steam remote play

name: Premier Servi

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.73 GHz Intel Pentium M or higher
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Controllers needed for local multiplayer
